name: developer-roadmap
description: Comprehensive plugin for learning all 78 developer career paths with AI-powered guidance from developer-roadmap.sh repository. Features 7 specialized agents covering 18+ technology domains.
author: Developer Roadmap Community

agents.name: language-fundamentals
agents.description: Expert in programming languages and foundational computer science concepts

agents.name: web-development
agents.description: Specialist in Frontend, Backend, and Full Stack web development technologies

agents.name: mobile-platforms
agents.description: Expert in iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter and native mobile development

agents.name: data-ai-ml
agents.description: Specialist in Machine Learning, Data Engineering, AI and prompt engineering

agents.name: cloud-devops
agents.description: Expert in AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, DevOps and infrastructure technologies

agents.name: databases-architecture
agents.description: Specialist in database systems, system design, and software architecture

agents.name: specialized-roles
agents.description: Expert in Product Management, DevRel, Technical Writing, and specialized tools

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Explore and learn from any of the 78 developer roadmaps

commands.name: agents
commands.description: Discover which agent specializes in your area of interest

commands.name: search
commands.description: Search across all roadmaps and learning materials

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Test your knowledge with interactive questions and quizzes

commands.name: learning-path
commands.description: Build a personalized learning roadmap based on your goals

skills.name: language-skills
skills.description: Learn 10+ programming languages: Python, JavaScript, Go, Rust, Java, C++, PHP, Kotlin, Swift, TypeScript

skills.name: web-stack
skills.description: Master Frontend, Backend, Full Stack, React, Vue, Angular, Node.js, and modern web frameworks

skills.name: mobile-development
skills.description: Learn iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, and cross-platform mobile technologies

skills.name: ai-ml-engineering
skills.description: Master ML, Data Engineering, AI Engineering, MLOps, and Prompt Engineering

skills.name: cloud-infrastructure
skills.description: Learn AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, DevOps, Terraform, and infrastructure management

skills.name: database-systems
skills.description: Master PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, SQL, and database design patterns

skills.name: system-architecture
skills.description: Learn system design, API design, software architecture, and design patterns
